title: Game-Based Training Design for Australian Rules Football Inside-50 Entry

context.prior_knowledge: Proficiency in Australian Rules Football fundamentals and intermediate-level sports leadership experience
context.additional_context: Data-driven training environment using digital devices, applying exercise mechanics linked to science curricula

learning_goals: Learners can implement ball reception methods (kick/handball) and positional decisions upon entering the inside-50 at 80% accuracy under conditions similar to actual matches
Learners reduce decision-making time under pressure to within 3.2 seconds, the average match time
Learners achieve an effective disposal ratio of over 65% during training sessions
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
